AttackTell.TellText: The attacker shifts into stance, weapon raised for a disciplined horizontal strike.

Outcome.ResponseText: You redirect the attack with practiced form, creating an opening!
Your guard absorbs the textbook strike.
You sidestep but the swing clips your uniform.
Bracing does little against the focused cut.
The strike connects with trained precision.

AttackTell.TellText: Dropping into a forward stance, the attacker lunges with a sharp thrust.

Outcome.ResponseText: You pivot aside as the thrust extends past you.
You knock the attack aside at the last moment.
The piercing attack partially bypasses your guard.
Bracing offers no protection against the precise thrust.
The thrust catches you square - flawless form.

AttackTell.TellText: The attacker raises their weapon high, channeling spiritual energy into a powerful overhead strike.

Outcome.ResponseText: You catch the overhead strike - spirit energy crackles against your guard!
You roll aside as spectral power flickers around the attacker.
The weight behind the blow is too much to redirect fully.
You absorb some impact but still stagger.
The spirit-enhanced blow crashes down with devastating force.

AttackTell.TellText: The attacker drops low, sweeping toward your ankles with supernatural speed.

Outcome.ResponseText: You hop over the sweep with perfect timing.
You check the sweep with your shin.
The angle makes a clean parry difficult.
Bracing low helps but you still take the hit.
The sweep takes your legs out.

AttackTell.TellText: Reversing their grip, the attacker winds up for a quick handle strike.

Outcome.ResponseText: You deflect the strike away from your face.
You lean back just in time.
You knock the arm aside but the strike still grazes you.
Bracing does nothing against a blow to the head.
Stars explode in your vision as the handle connects.

AttackTell.TellText: Fox-fire flickers as the attacker's movements become impossible to read.

Outcome.ResponseText: You hold steady, ready for the real attack.
Your guard catches the true strike, barely.
You dodge the wrong way - the real attack finds you.
You parry air as the true strike comes from elsewhere.
The deceptive illusion-wrapped strike finds its mark.

AttackTell.TellText: Eyes blazing with spiritual power, the attacker unleashes a storm of rapid strikes.

Outcome.ResponseText: You weather the onslaught behind your guard.
You endure the supernatural barrage.
You evade some strikes but others find their mark.
The speed and fury make parrying impossible.
The flurry of blows pummels you mercilessly.

AttackTell.TellText: With a primal yell, the attacker swings their weapon wildly, oni horns flickering into existence.

Outcome.ResponseText: You throw yourself clear of the brutal swing!
Your guard holds but the impact rattles your bones.
The sheer force behind the swing overwhelms your parry.
You hunker down but still get knocked aside.
The demonic fury sends you reeling.

AttackTell.TellText: The attacker raises their weapon overhead, their oni spirit roaring with rage.

Outcome.ResponseText: You dive clear as the weapon dents the ground where you stood!
Your guard buckles under the tremendous force.
Even braced, the impact drives you to your knees.
Attempting to parry that is nearly suicidal.
The crushing blow flattens you.

AttackTell.TellText: A guardian spirit manifests a spectral shield as the attacker charges forward.

Outcome.ResponseText: You pivot aside, the ghostly shield passing through empty air!
You plant your feet against the spiritual impact.
Shield meets guard in a jarring collision.
There's no blade to parry, only momentum.
The phantom shield slam sends you stumbling back.

AttackTell.TellText: The attacker raises their spectral shield high and brings it down edge-first.

Outcome.ResponseText: You step back as the spirit barrier crashes down.
You catch the rim on your guard.
You knock the shield aside but the impact still rattles you.
The shield edge crashes into you despite bracing.
The shield edge cracks into you with supernatural force.

AttackTell.TellText: The shadow spreads malformed arms wide, lunging to engulf you.

Outcome.ResponseText: You slip past the grasping darkness!
You knock the shadow-limbs aside.
Your guard creates distance.
Bracing makes you easier to grab.
Cold shadow-stuff seizes you.

AttackTell.TellText: The attacker lowers their shoulder and charges like their oni patron.

Outcome.ResponseText: You sidestep the reckless charge!
You plant your feet and barely hold ground.
Your guard buckles under the momentum.
There's nothing to parry - only raw force.
The charge tramples you completely.

AttackTell.TellText: The attacker's face contorts as their inner spirit lets loose a terrifying battle cry.

Outcome.ResponseText: You steel your mind against the supernatural roar.
Your guard provides some physical protection but the fear seeps through.
You can't dodge sound - the roar washes over you.
You can't parry a battle cry.
The demonic roar shakes you to your core.

AttackTell.TellText: The photographer raises their camera - but it's the flash that attacks!

Outcome.ResponseText: You twist aside as the supernatural flash sears past.
You shield your eyes from the spirit-light.
Bracing does little against a piercing arrow.
Parrying an arrow is nearly impossible.
The tengu-powered flash burns your retinas.

AttackTell.TellText: The attacker takes their time, focusing with unnatural precision through a viewfinder.

Outcome.ResponseText: You move but their tengu's eye tracks you!
The focused light-beam punches into your guard.
Bracing makes you an easier target.
The arrow is too fast and precise to parry.
The perfectly aimed shot finds its mark.

AttackTell.TellText: Burst mode activates - each flash becomes a projectile of spiritual light.

Outcome.ResponseText: Your guard intercepts most of the flash volley.
You hunker down as light-bolts rain around you.
You dodge some arrows but not all.
You can only parry one arrow at a time.
Multiple spirit-flashes pepper your body.

AttackTell.TellText: The attacker flicks a metal lens cap at you with supernatural accuracy.

Outcome.ResponseText: You lean aside as the cap spins past your ear.
You knock the spinning cap aside.
The knife thuds into your guard.
Bracing doesn't help against thrown weapons.
The lens cap cuts into you - sharper than it should be.

AttackTell.TellText: The attacker smirks - you notice a tripwire connected to a flash array.

Outcome.ResponseText: You leap away just as the trap triggers!
You minimize the damage but still get blinded.
Your guard doesn't help against a floor trap.
You can't parry a trap.
The trap catches you completely off guard.

AttackTell.TellText: An ofuda talisman ignites with spiritual fire between the caster's hands.

Outcome.ResponseText: You weave aside as the fire talisman scorches past.
Your guard disperses some of the spirit flames.
You endure the searing heat.
You can't parry fire.
The burning ofuda explodes against you.

AttackTell.TellText: Frost forms around a calligraphy brush as kanji are traced in the air.

Outcome.ResponseText: You duck as ice kanji shatter against the wall.
Your guard deflects the frozen characters.
The cold bites deep even through your resistance.
You shatter some shards but others find their mark.
Ice kanji pierce and freeze your flesh.

AttackTell.TellText: Static crackles as the caster points a mechanical pencil at you.

Outcome.ResponseText: You move but lightning follows thought!
You ground yourself against the shock.
Your guard conducts the electricity painfully.
Your weapon becomes a lightning rod.
Lightning courses through your body.

AttackTell.TellText: Paper talismans spread in an arc, each one igniting with spirit fire.

Outcome.ResponseText: You shield yourself against the wall of spirit fire.
You dive aside but flames still lick at you.
Your guard provides some protection from the inferno.
You can't parry a wave of fire.
The talisman fire washes over you.

AttackTell.TellText: Multiple ofuda crumple together, spirit fire building to critical mass.

Outcome.ResponseText: You dive away but the explosion still catches you.
You hunker down against the explosive force.
Your guard helps but the explosion is omnidirectional.
There is nothing to parry against an explosion.
The compressed talismans detonate with devastating force.

AttackTell.TellText: Ghostly hitodama orbit the caster before streaking toward you.

Outcome.ResponseText: The spirit lights track you - you evade most but not all.
Your guard absorbs the ghostly impacts.
You steel yourself against the magical barrage.
You deflect some missiles but they reform and strike.
The hitodama pummel you relentlessly.

AttackTell.TellText: The caster's eyes glow as they channel their yokai's psychic power.

Outcome.ResponseText: You fortify your mind against the forbidden knowledge.
Physical defense offers limited protection against mental attack.
You can't dodge a mental attack.
There's nothing physical to parry.
The psychic blast tears through your thoughts.

AttackTell.TellText: Shadow tendrils reach from a forbidden grimoire, seeking your spirit.

Outcome.ResponseText: Your guard severs the dark connection.
You resist the draining through sheer will.
You pull away but tendrils still latch on briefly.
You can't parry intangible magic.
The shadows drain your spiritual energy.

AttackTell.TellText: Forbidden kanji are traced while an ancient curse is chanted.

Outcome.ResponseText: You strengthen your will and resist the hex.
You break line of sight but the curse partially lands.
Physical barriers mean little to curses.
You can't parry spoken words of power.
The curse settles into your bones.

AttackTell.TellText: Divine light gathers around a gohei wand as Amaterasu is invoked.

Outcome.ResponseText: You evade the beam of sacred sunlight.
Your guard absorbs some of the divine radiance.
You endure the searing holy power.
You can't parry divine wrath.
Holy sunlight purifies your very soul.

AttackTell.TellText: Both hands raise skyward, channeling Amaterasu's judgment.

Outcome.ResponseText: You steel your spirit against divine reckoning.
You try to escape but the sun sees all.
Your guard means nothing against divine will.
You cannot parry the heavens themselves.
Divine sunlight sears you with holy judgment.

AttackTell.TellText: Pure white flames dance along sleeves as the caster prepares to cast them forth.

Outcome.ResponseText: You resist the purifying flames through willpower.
You roll aside, sacred fire singeing your clothes.
Your guard catches some of the holy fire.
You can't parry consecrated flames.
Sacred fire engulfs you.

AttackTell.TellText: A portal opens beneath your feet - dark shapes emerge from the void.

Outcome.ResponseText: You leap clear as void-things grasp at air!
You slash at the tendrils, severing some.
Your guard prevents the worst of the grasping.
Bracing makes you easier to grab.
Shadow tendrils wrap around you, squeezing.

AttackTell.TellText: A swirling torii gate opens, pulling at your very existence.

Outcome.ResponseText: You anchor yourself to this realm through will.
Your guard provides focus against the pull.
You stumble away but the void's pull is relentless.
You can't parry dimensional magic.
The gateway tears at your essence.

AttackTell.TellText: The idol's voice hits a supernatural note that shouldn't be possible.

Outcome.ResponseText: You cover your ears and steel your mind.
Your guard does nothing against the sound wave.
You can't dodge sound.
You can't parry a sound wave.
The impossible note pierces your mind.

AttackTell.TellText: The performer swings their portable mic stand like an improvised weapon, laughing.

Outcome.ResponseText: You easily deflect the amateur swing!
You sidestep the clumsy attack.
Your guard catches the unconventional weapon.
You take the hit - it hurts more than expected.
The mic stand cracks against you - humiliating.

AttackTell.TellText: The idol begins their signature dance move, captivating lights swirling around them.

Outcome.ResponseText: You focus your mind and resist the idol's charm.
You avert your eyes but still catch glimpses.
Physical defense doesn't help against enchantment.
You can't parry a hallucination.
The performance consumes your attention completely.

AttackTell.TellText: The idol's smile turns cruel as they begin a devastating verbal takedown.

Outcome.ResponseText: You steel your ego against the verbal assault.
Words cut deeper than swords sometimes.
You can't dodge an insult.
You can't parry words.
The savage roast wounds your pride and focus.

AttackTell.TellText: Paper shikigami are thrown that unfold into a swarm of spirit servants.

Outcome.ResponseText: Your guard fends off the paper spirit swarm.
You hunker down against the tide of shikigami.
You evade some but they're everywhere.
You can only parry one at a time.
The paper spirits overwhelm you.

AttackTell.TellText: A ghostly whip-arm materializes from the shadows.

Outcome.ResponseText: You duck under the spectral lash.
Your weapon disrupts the spirit arm.
Your guard catches the semi-corporeal strike.
The spirit lash phases partially through your defense.
The ghostly tendril lashes through you.
